title: pancake circus font
content:
Hello.  
Any suggestions for a similar font to this?  
Thanks,  
Liz

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012183020im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/3900_3601_m_4353.jpg)

 [‹ Business card typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012183020/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42409 "Go to previous forum topic") [Extended Sans Serif Small Caps and Bodoni-ish italic? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012183020/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42384 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lizthiem

comments.content: Sorry to side track, but is that place in Chicago?

Hi Liz,

Looks similar to our [Mister Television](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012183020/http:/www.fontdiner.com/menu_vegas.html) font . . .

Stuart :D
